#  Evaluating Research Validity 

+ **GM&L framework –**
	+ **19 questions**
	+ **8 rating scales**
+ **19 questions** **<U+F0E8> 3 main groups**
	+ **Key aspects of the design and methods (1 – 8)**
	+ **Evaluative ratings (9 – 16)**
	+ **General evaluation questions (17 – 19)**
+ **“… merit or worth of the study as a whole…”**
